author: Sean Gregory
title: The World’s Sports Stadiums Are Being Converted Into Hospitals to Fight the Coronavirus Outbreak
description: From space to air conditioning, arenas offer almost everything you need to quickly set up an emergency hospital.
content: Around 10 days ago, Danny Zausner, chief operating officer of the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center in New York City — home of the U.S. Open — received a call that would be considered inconceivable not that long ago. Local government officials want… [+7740 chars]
